description: It aims to minimise the effect of coronavirus, meaning passengers will have to depart from Poole.
title: Coronavirus: Condor switches ferry to 'freight-only' service
title_page: Coronavirus: Condor switches ferry to 'freight-only' service - BBC News
maintext: "We fully understand that the change may be inconvenient to some passengers but are working in the best interests of the islands as a whole and feel this is the best option available to us."
